SHORTTITLE  Bill McCallum, assisted by Pavlos Tzermias and Joseph Wetherell: The method of Coleman and Chabauty

  • Pavlos Tzermias' lectures on “The Manin-Mumford Conjecture: A Brief Survey”: dvi, ps, pdf
  • Wetherell's project on “An application of the method of Coleman and Chabauty.”: description. It refers to Wetherell's thesis: dvi, ps, pdf
  • Cathy O'Neil's thesis (dvi, ps, pdf) on Jacobians of Curves of Genus One was the basis of Tomas Klenke's talk.
  • Several U of A graduates students worked with Bill McCallum on constructing the Jacobian of a genus 1 curve. Their web site has the details. Slides for David Marshall's talk on this topic: dvi, ps, pdf
